meaningMnemonic: Take your <radical>towel</radical> and make it <radical>long</radical>. It has to be longer than that! For this will be your <kanji>notebook</kanji>, which you will write all your notes in.
readingMnemonic: Inside your long towel <kanji>notebook</kanji> you just write the same name over and over again: "Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading>" (ちょう).
